title: Optimize Your YouTube Videos
description: A library of resources for optimizing your YouTube videos for SEO.
content: OverviewTips, strategies, and techniques to help your videos get found on YouTube’s platform. Video SEO is an important part of growing a successful YouTube channel. In fact, many successful YouTubers cite SEO as the #1 driver behind their channel’s success. So if want to rank your videos at the top of YouTube’s search results, you’re in the right place. This page contains a library of resources to help you optimize your videos for YouTube SEO.YouTube Keyword ResearchJust like with “normal” SEO, video SEO starts with keyword research. And this resource will show you a handful of strategies that you can use to uncover keywords for your YouTube videos. Explore this ResourceYouTube Video TitleYour video’s title is a critical part of optimizing your video for SEO. See best practices for optimizing your Video Title here. Explore this ResourceYouTube Video DescriptionYouTube uses your video’s description to understand your video’s topic, theme, content and more. This resource will show you how to write SEO-friendly descriptions in 2024. Explore this ResourceYouTube TagsLearn the exact process for optimizing your video’s tags (including breakdowns of videos that are rankings in YouTube for super competitive keywords). Explore this ResourceEngagement SignalsLearn how to generate more subscribers, likes and comments on every video that you publish. Explore this ResourceAudience RetentionHow do you get viewers to watch your video all the way to the end? This resource has you covered with a number of actionable tips and strategies. Explore this ResourceWatch TimeLearn how to maximize YouTube’s #1 rankings signal: Total Watch Time. Explore this ResourceChannel KeywordsThe right Channel Keywords can increase the rankings of your entire channel. See best practices for writing Channel Keywords right here. Explore this ResourceYouTube HashtagsHow to use YouTube hashtags to get more views on your videos. Explore this Resource
